Metadata.name: Custom Sub Menu (Vita)
Metadata.author: AnimatedSwine37, ShrineFox, Sierra, Rudiger, Tekka, Tupelov
Metadata.description:
Sub Menu with configurable extensions.
Features: - Mobile Calendar by ShrineFox and Tekka (Open Calendar from quick travel menu - QuickTravelPlus by ShrineFox and Tekka (Adds more options in Quick Travel menu) - VRGameOverSkip by Tekka (Skips velvet room scene after game over) - DungeonOptions by Tekka (Fast travel to any dungeon floor after deadline, use goho-ms and manage party) - FindAFriend by AnimatedSwine37 (Teleport to wherever an available s. link is) - SaveAnywhere by Tupelov (Save in all fields and dungeon floors) - Reap-balanced Encounters by Tekka (Guaranteed reaper encounter every 22 chests) - Dungeon Text Fixes by Rudiger (Corrects a couple of minor annoyances with notification text in dungeons) - Default Direct Commands by Tekka (Sets all party member tactics to Direct Commands automatically)
